verses.verse: <S%H582>"Isn't<s%> a man forced to labor on <S%H776>earth?<s%> <S%H3117>Aren't<s%> his days like the <S%H3117>days<s%> of a hired <S%H7916>hand?<s%>
As a <S%H5650>servant<s%> who earnestly <S%H7602>desires<s%> the <S%H6738>shadow,<s%> as a <S%H7916>hireling<s%> who <S%H6960>looks<s%> for his <S%H6467>wages,<s%>
so am I made to <S%H5157>possess<s%> <S%H3391>months<s%> of <S%H7723>misery,<s%> <S%H5999>wearisome<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%> are appointed to <S%H4487>me.<s%>

When I lie <S%H7901>down,<s%> I <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H6965><s%> 'When shall I arise, and the <S%H6153>night<s%> be <S%H4059>gone?<s%>' I <S%H7646>toss<s%> and <S%H5076>turn<s%> until the dawning of the <S%H5399>day.<s%>
My <S%H1320>flesh<s%> is <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H7415>worms<s%> and <S%H1487>clods<s%> of <S%H6083>dust.<s%> My <S%H5785>skin<s%> closes <S%H7280>up,<s%> and breaks out <S%H3988>afresh.<s%>
My <S%H3117>days<s%> are <S%H7043>swifter<s%> than a <S%H708>weaver<s%>'s shuttle, and are <S%H3615>spent<s%> <S%H657>without<s%> <S%H8615>hope.<s%>
Oh <S%H2142>remember<s%> that my <S%H2416>life<s%> is a <S%H7307>breath.<s%> My <S%H5869>eye<s%> shall no <S%H7725>more<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2896>good.<s%>
The <S%H5869>eye<s%> of him who <S%H7789>sees<s%> me shall <S%H7789>see<s%> me no <S%H5869>more.<s%> Your eyes shall be on me, but I shall not be.
As the <S%H6051>cloud<s%> is <S%H3615>consumed<s%> and vanishes <S%H3212>away,<s%> so he who goes <S%H3381>down<s%> to <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> shall come up no <S%H5927>more.<s%>
He shall <S%H7725>return<s%> no more to his <S%H1004>house,<s%> neither shall his <S%H4725>place<s%> know him any <S%H5234>more.<s%>

"Therefore I will not <S%H2820>keep<s%> <S%H6310>silent.<s%> I will <S%H1696>speak<s%> in the <S%H6862>anguish<s%> of my <S%H7307>spirit.<s%> I will <S%H7878>complain<s%> in the <S%H4751>bitterness<s%> of my <S%H5315>soul.<s%>
Am I a <S%H3220>sea,<s%> or a sea <S%H8577>monster,<s%> that you <S%H7760>put<s%> a guard over <S%H4929>me?<s%>
When I <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H6210><s%> 'My bed shall <S%H5162>comfort<s%> <S%H4904>me.<s%> My couch shall <S%H5375>ease<s%> my <S%H7879>complaint;<s%>'
then you <S%H2865>scare<s%> me with <S%H2472>dreams,<s%> and <S%H1204>terrify<s%> me through <S%H2384>visions:<s%>
so that my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H977>chooses<s%> <S%H4267>strangling,<s%> <S%H4194>death<s%> rather than my <S%H6106>bones.<s%>
I <S%H3988>loathe<s%> my <S%H2421>life.<s%> I don't want to live <S%H5769>forever.<s%> Leave me <S%H2308>alone,<s%> for my <S%H3117>days<s%> are but a <S%H1892>breath.<s%>
What is <S%H582>man,<s%> that you should <S%H1431>magnify<s%> <S%H7896>him,<s%> that you should set your mind on <S%H3820>him,<s%>
that you should <S%H6485>visit<s%> him every <S%H1242>morning,<s%> and <S%H974>test<s%> him every <S%H7281>moment?<s%>
How <S%H4100>long<s%> will you not look <S%H8159>away<s%> from <S%H7503>me,<s%> nor leave me alone until I swallow <S%H1104>down<s%> my <S%H7536>spittle?<s%>

If I have <S%H2398>sinned,<s%> what <S%H6466>do<s%> I do to <S%H5341>you,<s%> you watcher of <S%H120>men?<s%> Why have you <S%H7760>set<s%> me as a <S%H4645>mark<s%> for <S%H4853>you,<s%> so that I am a burden to myself?

Why do you not <S%H5375>pardon<s%> my <S%H6588>disobedience,<s%> and take <S%H5674>away<s%> my <S%H5771>iniquity?<s%> For now shall I lie <S%H7901>down<s%> in the <S%H6083>dust.<s%> You will seek me <S%H7836>diligently,<s%> but I shall not be."
